content: CFS-T RRS plug seals Plug seal for sealing single cables/pipes in round penetrations ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Cable transit frames and penetration sealing systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Available in galvanized steel and stainless steel Removable inlays for easy adjustment to match cable diameter Applications Sealing round penetrations ### TECHNICAL DATA: Temperature resistance range: -40 - 122 °F Free from: Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) Reaction to fire class (EN 13501-1): E Technical Data | Temperature resistance range | -40 - 122 °F | Free from | Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) | Reaction to fire class (EN 13501-1) | E ### ITEMS- 2042729 - Plug Seal for round openings - Package Size 1 pc - 2042730 - Plug Seal for round openings - Package Size 1 pc - 2042732 - Plug Seal with fittings and bolts in stainless steel - Package Size 1 pc - 2042738 - Plug Seal for round openings - Package Size 1 pc
